title: Elf and Efficiency
description: A tale of greed and corruption, conspiracy and magic. Santa is to be relocated to a distribution centre near Birmingham, England. His elves and reindeer are to be made redundant. Christmas needs to be modernised, but he is being duped, World leaders are conspiring to steal his magic and take over Christmas for their own ends and they, in turn, are being used by the people who really control the World. There are elves, suffragettes, reindeer, sleighs, tinsel and bells, energy drink and murder!
author: Steve Hedges
